mapper.insert: insert into tb_u3d_web_exp_result(user_id, experiment_id, worker, experiment_times, zbs_effective_time, zbs_total_pick_time, zbs_efficiency, zbs_walk_step, zqs_effective_time, zqs_total_pick_time, zqs_efficiency, zqs_walk_step, bzs_effective_time, bzs_total_pick_time, bzs_efficiency, bzs_walk_step, order_num, goods_item, goods_total_num, user_summary, user_comment, create_time, update_time,star) values (#{userId},#{experimentId},#{worker},#{experimentTimes},#{zbsEffectiveTime},#{zbsTotalPickTime},#{zbsEfficiency}, #{zbsWalkStep},#{zqsEffectiveTime},#{zqsTotalPickTime},#{zqsEfficiency},#{zqsWalkStep},#{bzsEffectiveTime},#{bzsTotalPickTime}, #{bzsEfficiency},#{bzsWalkStep},#{orderNum},#{goodsItem},#{goodsTotalNum},#{userSummary},#{userComment},now(),now(),#{star})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, experiment_id, worker, experiment_times, zbs_effective_time, zbs_total_pick_time, zbs_efficiency, zbs_walk_step, zqs_effective_time, zqs_total_pick_time, zqs_efficiency, zqs_walk_step, bzs_effective_time, bzs_total_pick_time, bzs_efficiency, bzs_walk_step, order_num, goods_item, goods_total_num, user_summary, user_comment, star, create_time, update_time from tb_u3d_web_exp_result where experiment_id=#{experimentId} and experiment_times=#{experimentTimes}
